00036 #ifndef MODIFIERS_HPP_
00037 #define MODIFIERS_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "AbstractModifier.hpp"
00040 #include <cmath>
00041 
00045 class FactorModifier : public AbstractModifier
00046 {
00047 private:
00049     double mFactor;
00050 
00051 public:
00056     FactorModifier(double factor=1)
00057         : mFactor(factor)
00058     {
00059     }
00060 
00068     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00069     {
00070         return (param * mFactor);
00071     }
00072 };
00073 
00079 class TimeModifier : public AbstractModifier
00080 {
00081 public:
00085     TimeModifier()
00086     {
00087     }
00088 
00096     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00097     {
00098         return param * sin(time);
00099     }
00100 };
00101 
00105 class FixedModifier : public AbstractModifier
00106 {
00107 private:
00109     double mValue;
00110 
00111 public:
00116     FixedModifier(double value)
00117         : mValue(value)
00118     {
00119     }
00120 
00128     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00129     {
00130         return mValue;
00131     }
00132 };
00133 
00137 class DummyModifier : public AbstractModifier
00138 {
00139 private:
00140 
00141 public:
00145     DummyModifier()
00146     {
00147     }
00148 
00156     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00157     {
00158         return param;
00159     }
00160 };
00161 
00162 
00163 #endif  //MODIFIERS_HPP_
